title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 32.7 - Approval of materials and devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 32.7 - Approval of materials and devices

State Regulations

Except as hereinafter specifically provided, approval by
the commissioner is not required in respect to a passenger tramway or any
material or device associated therewith. A material or device which the board
(prior to 1975) or commissioner has approved pursuant to section
21
of the Labor Law
for use in complying with this Part may be used, subject to the requirement of
the resolution of approval, as if by the Part specifically authorized, any
general or special provision of this Part notwithstanding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
32.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
